alert.note: Alert for Eastern Lincoln County; South Central Mountains; Southwest Chaves County (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: High Wind Watch issued January 10 at 3:27AM MST until January 12 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WATCH IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING THROUGH LATE THURSDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...West winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 65 mph possible. * WHERE...Eastern Lincoln County, South Central Mountains, and Southwest Chaves County. * WHEN...From this evening through late Thursday night. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds could blow down trees and power lines. Power outages are possible. Travel could be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Areas of blowing snow and reduced visibility could be possible in the mountains of Lincoln county.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Lincoln County; South Central Mountains; Southwest Chaves County
